item.title: CVE-2023-3864|2024-10-09T19:13:07.827Z -- snow%20software -- slm
item.description: Blind SQL injection in a service running in Snow Software license manager from version 8.0.0 up to and including 9.30.1 on Windows allows a logged in user with high privileges to inject SQL commands via the web portal.
